title: The new Ashe
body:
OMG OMG OMG RIOT THANKS YOU!!! ASHE FEELS LIKE REALLY GOOD....I feel her passive late game could be a little strong....But I really like the fact she hits really hard with her Q full stacked...and it keeps the essence of ashe.

I cant wait for the next rework or champion VU...crossing my fingers for some love for MF.

ashe is the only adc who can 

ult passive aa w aa and 100-0 before you can do anyhting
